activity_b.text: Sanjaya works in the ICT training lab in Colombo.
He starts work at eight-thirty every morning, but today he is starting earlier because the network engineer is inspecting the server room.
He usually begins his day by checking the computer connections, but this morning he is updating the antivirus software because the instructor is explaining system protection.
He normally uses his own USB drive and headset, but today he is sharing a lab computer because his desktop is under maintenance.
He always backs up data, but now he is testing the Wi-Fi connection because it was unstable yesterday.
Most days, Sanjaya installs applications and troubleshoots errors, but this week he is learning to configure firewalls.
He usually checks the networking system, but today he is connecting the projector.
He normally discusses the day’s schedule with his colleagues, but today they are all listening carefully to the Manager’s instructions about the inspection and day’s program.
At the end of the day, he always shuts down the systems, but this afternoon he is cleaning the keyboards because they are dusty after the practical session.
